name: Bomb-O-Mastoras
description:
Bomb - O - Mastoras is a fast-paced, local multiplayer arena brawler, where up to 4 players can  compete against each other in order to decide who's the last ghost standing. Each player is given an unlimited amount of bombs, for unlimited amounts of fun!
The rules are simple: Detonate the bombs in your enemy's path, and try not to  get blown out of the arena by yourself. The last ghost to be standing in the arena wins!

Controls: Connect up to 4 controllers to play with your friends. Once in the main menu of the game, you can join the party by pressing the Start or X button. Once the game starts, you can use the Left Thumbstick to move your ghost, A to jump & X to place a bomb. 

Raytracing: This game utilizes raytracing lighting features (RTGI, RTAO, RT Shadows) as part of the NVisionary Environments special category (2021 Epic Megajam). As a result, the visuals of the game when played on a non-rtx Nvidia card, might not be identical to the images and gameplay video of this page.
